column5: Need to know for Wednesday. Will I have a better chance at lake o rivers or bracebridge ice (back lakes), and how far north will I have to go to find solid ice? Thanks!
rubbing shoulders with hooligans in the city or relative solitude on a pretty lake?  Seems simple to me!  Can't chime in as to ice safety, but I would guess smaller lakes are just fine.
Can anyone who lives up there confirm?
It was two days of warmth. If there's still two inches here in the south i think muskokas are probably at about 12" now.
12inches of what?  Ice?   That's wishful thinking..
We were at 6 here before the thaw. Muskokas are usually double. Im talking small lakes.
Even the back lakes aren't close to 12 inches, the weather up here has been as warm as it's been down there.   Cross your fingers for some cold weather.
Ya, we're going to wait till friday so that we're sure that we aren't wasting gas. Thanks everyone!
